services.heading: Our Core Services
services.subheading: Over 50 years of expertise in precision surface engineering

items.title: Hydraulic Ram Repair
items.description: Complete hydraulic cylinder repair and refurbishment services for construction, agriculture, and industrial sectors. From seal replacement to complete rebuilds, we minimize your downtime with express service options.

items.title: Cylinder Tube Honing
items.description: Precision honing services for cylinders up to 300mm diameter and 2.2 meters length. We restore worn cylinder bores to optimal condition, eliminating scratches, corrosion, and surface imperfections.

items.title: Hydraulic Hose Manufacturing
items.description: Custom hydraulic hose assemblies and high-pressure fluid transfer solutions for industrial, construction, and agricultural applications. Fast turnaround with quality assured testing.

about.title: 50+ Years of Engineering Excellence
content: Established in 1971, Dynasurf has built a reputation as one of the UK's leading precision engineering companies. Our name, derived from "Dynamic Surfaces," reflects our commitment to delivering exceptional surface engineering solutions.

From our purpose-built facility in Sandbach, Cheshire, we serve industries across the UK with rapid turnaround times and uncompromising quality. Our investment in state-of-the-art equipment allows us to handle projects that others cannot, including cylinder honing up to 300mm diameter and 2.2 meters in length.
Whether you need emergency repairs or scheduled maintenance, our experienced team is ready to deliver solutions that keep your equipment running at peak performance.

emergency.title: Emergency Express Services
content: When equipment failure threatens your operations, Dynasurf's emergency express service ensures minimal downtime. With materials kept in stock and a dedicated rapid response team, we can often complete urgent repairs the same day.

Our express services cover all three core areas: hydraulic ram repairs, cylinder honing, and hydraulic hose manufacturing. We understand that every hour of downtime costs money, which is why we've structured our operations to deliver the fastest possible turnaround without compromising quality.
